column4: Is there any other way to make a bootable usb drive besides the prefered way on UBuntu website??? That didn't work for me.
In what way did it "not work"?
when i tried to boot into the usb drive, it shows "No Operating System found", and on another computer it shows a flashing "_"
I have redownloaded ubuntu from different sources and tried different version the bootable usb drive maker. No luck
